title: when you look at the balance team in person you start understanding why this game is declining
body:
I dont know why Meddler is hiring these young gamers to handle the balance team, this is a bad idea for the simple reasons that im about to explain.

1. young gaming balance team is going to be biased to what THEY like to play, this clouds objective/goal oriented balancing decisions.
??? examples:
  *{{champion:69}}  rework failure

*juggernaut meta {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} 

*constant balance swings that hurt LCS, pro's are not machines that can easily adapt to every fkn patch
 'hey im a Riot balance team member, i have no fkn idea what im doing'
http://www.adanyeva.org/Assets/b7e.jpg

Seriously Riot can you fkn explain what your goals are for this game? 


This is what you are doing: selecting a few champions that will dominate for a couple of patches and shutting some champions down.

Bjergson 4/20/2016 on twitch: fan sends message for bjerg to play champion X, 

bjerg reply: 'No point in playing that champ, it's about to be changed'

This is Riot's balance team in a nutshell

why the fk should i play any champ when it's certain champs favored each patch and others destroyed, this is becoming a patch/trendy balance that's going NOWHERE, no GOAL, just constant fkn change

im mad? yea, DECLINING LCS numbers, DECLINING player base.
